text: Sándor Szokolay (30 March 1931 - 8 December 2013)Elhunyt Szokolay Sándor zeneszerző was an Hungarian composer and a professor of the Liszt Ferenc Academy, Budapest. Szokolay was born on 30 March 1931 in Kunágota, Hungary. He was chairman of the Hungarian Kodály Society (1978) and the Hungarian Music Camera (1991–92), and he is member of the Hungarian Széchenyi Art Academy (1992). Szokolay died on 8 December 2013 in Sopron from pneumonia, Hungary, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Szokolay Sándor: Sopron years (accessed at the Wayback Machine) * Evangelic Church life * Fidelio * Sopron walker’s book * Pearlhymn Vivat Academia 2005.
